MCNV2 Toolbox
=============

Welcome to the MCNV2 documentation. MCNV2 is a technology-agnostic toolbox for CNV quality assessment using Mendelian Precision in parent–offspring trios.

.. note::
   
   This documentation covers both the interactive **Shiny application** and the **command-line interface (CLI)** for batch processing.
